description:
This talented woman serves as both the director of Neo Zeon`s Newtype Labs and as Char`s chief operations officer, responsible for planning strategies for the Neo Zeon fleet. Char clearly thinks highly of Nanai`s abilities, entrusting her with the all-important assault on the Earth Federation`s Luna II base. However, their romantic relationship is largely for show, and Nanai soon becomes jealous of Char`s interest in the young Newtype Quess Paraya.
Source: Official Site
name: Nanai Miguel
